data.name: Magnificent Monsters
data.detailed_description:
Magnificent Monsters is a first-person adventure game that lets you explore an island full of monsters.

You are a photographer, traveling to an uncharted island to document its wildlife.
Equipped only with a camera, a compass & some vegetables, you make your way through the thickets of the surrounding jungles.

  • Traverse the island and discover its many secrets.
  • Snap the most magnificent shots by documenting the monsters' most interesting poses.
  • Collect the monsters' many snapshots in your trusty album.
  • Beware: There may be deadly monsters.
  • Find out what happens when you feed the hidden vegetables to the native wildlife.

Will you find the monsters? Or will they find you?

data.short_description: Snap photos of magnificent creatures & explore a mysterious island. Will you find the monsters? Or will they find you?
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100T @ 2.50 GHz / AMD Phenom II X3 B73
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4850 or NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 @ 3.10 GHz / AMD Phenom II X6 1100T
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7700 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 570
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6.3 Leopard 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-540M @ 2.53 GHz
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 6750M or NVIDIA GeForce GT 330M
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.9 Mavericks 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-540M @ 3.40 GHz
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 M290X or Nvidia GeForce GTX 775M 2GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
